amendment.description: Amendment sought to require $128 million received from the sale of new leases to be made available to fully fund the Commodity Futures Trading Commission to limit speculation in energy markets.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 26 printed in House Report 112-540 to require $128 million received from the sale of new leases to be made available to fully fund the Commodity Futures Trading Commission to limit speculation in energy markets.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeLauro amendment (A024) Failed by recorded vote: 180 - 235 (Roll no. 408).
